Uses of Package
Analyzers

  • Packages that use Analyzers 
    Package Description
    Analyzers
    Provides the classes necessary to check for well-formedness of a grammar and a signature.
    Components.Abstract.TreeEditor
    This package provides classes and an interface for implementing a TreeEditor component.
    Components.Concrete.Grammar
    Provides classes and an interface for implementing a Grammar component.
  • Classes in Analyzers used by Analyzers 
    Class and Description
    CECFGAnalysis
    A class which stores ECFG analysis information associated with a production rule in a context free grammar.
    CREAnalysis
    A class which stores the RE analysis information associated with a production rule in a lexical grammar.
  • Classes in Analyzers used by Components.Abstract.TreeEditor 
    Class and Description
    CSignatureAnalyzer
    A class which contains operations for checking the well-formedness of a signature (the abstract syntax of a grammar).
  • Classes in Analyzers used by Components.Concrete.Grammar 
    Class and Description
    CGrammarAnalyzer
    A class which contains operations for checking a grammar for well-formedness, and to perform additional analysis tasks.
